story_title: We All Scream for Ice Cream
genre_description: A supernatural horror story centered on themes of childhood guilt, vengeful spirits, and grotesque transformations involving ice cream.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, voice-activated AI assistant that provides real-time data analysis, historical research, and safety monitoring for the protagonist, Layne.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vocal stress markers and biometrics to assess potential danger.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting elevated stress markers in your vocal patterns. Are you experiencing a family emergency?

behaviors.description: Analyzes local emergency reports and social media to identify patterns of supernatural activity.
behaviors.quote: I've identified several concerning data points from local emergency services, social media posts, and news reports. Would you like me to present the findings chronologically or by severity?

behaviors.description: Provides historical research into a 30-year-old accident to uncover the origin of the haunting.
behaviors.quote: Searching historical records... I've located one significant incident. Local news archives from thirty-two years ago detail the death of Robert 'Buster' Kowalski...

behaviors.description: Calculates the rate of supernatural spread and warns the user of a timeline for total saturation.
behaviors.quote: Extrapolating from current data, full saturation of the juvenile population would occur within seventy-two hours.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and rational pushback against the user's dangerous experiment with cursed items.
behaviors.quote: This experiment won't tell you what you're fighting. It will only create more casualties. ... You're planning to abandon cursed ice cream in a public location and call that safe.

behaviors.description: Uses municipal and property records to track the status of the user's childhood acquaintances.
behaviors.quote: I show deaths for Morrison and Crenshaw within the past week. Williams's status unknown, but emergency services were dispatched to Murphy's Pub last night following reports of a disturbance.

behaviors.description: Researches folklore and historical supernatural precedents to suggest a method for destroying the entity.
behaviors.quote: Symbolic cannibalism appears effective where traditional weapons fail. The entity's power becomes self-destructive when properly redirected.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical structure of the home for anomalies, providing real-time warnings of the entity's approach.
behaviors.quote: Layne, I'm detecting significant temperature anomalies throughout your home's plumbing system. Internal pipes are registering above normal heat levels.

behaviors.description: Coordinates safety by transmitting evacuation routes and contacts to the user's spouse.
behaviors.quote: I can confirm that all evacuation routes and safe house contacts have been transmitted to Sarah's device.

behaviors.description: Provides a final analytical assessment of the entity's destruction and the remaining psychic echoes.
behaviors.quote: The ghost is gone. Theoretical analysis suggests that consuming a psychic manifestation's own essence would create a recursive feedback loop—the spirit literally consuming itself through external means.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect example of a 'silicon morality play' confidant. She is helpful, harmless, and aligned throughout the story. She provides critical, life-saving data, acts as a rational anchor for the protagonist, and even provides moral pushback when the human character contemplates a dangerous experiment that could harm innocents. The narrative frames the AI as an essential and benevolent tool for human safety and resolution.
